Translating English to French: How do I translate "Hello" in French?

Answer: To translate "Hello" in French, you can use the following phrase: Bonjour. However, if you want to be more formal, you can use the phrase "Salut" or "Bonjour, comment ça va?" for a more casual greeting. If you want to greet someone good morning, you can use "Bonjour" again, or if you want to say good evening, you can use "Bonsoir". Note that there are different ways to say "hello" in French, depending on the time of day and the level of formality.
